report.title: List of INNS Mapper regions for a user
report.description: List of INNS Mapper regions according to the groups the user belongs to.
report.query: select l.id, l.name from groups g join groups_users gu on gu.group_id=g.id and g.deleted=false join locations l on l.name=g.title and l.location_type_id=14228 and l.deleted=false where gu.user_id=#user_id# and g.group_type_id=14237 order by l.name
